definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage

sentences.english: Objective To explain the diagnosis and treatment of retrobulbar hematoma after baggy eye-plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹眼袋成形術併發球后血腫的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the prognostic risk factors of traumatic basal ganglia hematoma (TBGH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響外傷性基底節血腫預後的相關因素。

sentences.english: Microscopically, the splenic capsule appeared intact and there was no evidence of subcapsular hematoma formation.
sentences.chinese: 鏡檢脾包膜完整，無包膜下血腫形成。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical features and surgical outcome of the traumatic hematomas posterior cranial fossa .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性後顱窩血腫的臨牀特徵和手術療效。

sentences.english: On pathological evaluation most of hematomas were old and organized.
sentences.chinese: 病理顯示血腫多爲陳舊性和機化。

sentences.english: A fiver subcapsular hematoma is an extremely are complication of ESWL.
sentences.chinese: 肝臟被膜下血腫是此一手術極少見的併發症。

sentences.english: The hematoma lay between the dural and the brain.
sentences.chinese: 里根腦血腫的部位處於硬腦膜與腦實質之間。

sentences.english: Postoperative hematoma of scrotum occurred in 1 case ( 1/82 ), and no other perioperative complications occurred.
sentences.chinese: 手術後陰囊血腫1例，無其他併發症。

sentences.english: Two cases of phlegmonous gastritis complicated with subdural hematoma are reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 報告了二例蜂窩織性胃炎伴發硬腦膜下血腫。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effect of stereotaxic aspiration on chronic subdural hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討錐顱治療慢性硬膜下血腫的療效。

sentences.english: Results Brain edema and brain herniation caused by epidural hematoma lead to the death.
sentences.chinese: 結果死者系硬膜外血腫致腦水腫並腦疝而死亡。

sentences.english: There was no association between RPH and arterial sheath size or deployment of a vascular closure device.
sentences.chinese: 腹膜後血腫與動脈導管尺寸和血管縫合器的應用無關。

sentences.english: To discuss a new effective method for treatment of chronic subdural hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 探討一種新的治療慢性硬膜下血腫的有效方法。

sentences.english: The micro-damage puncture could reduce the formation of brain edema after ICH.
sentences.chinese: 微創血腫清除術能改善腦出血後的腦水腫形成。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the major points of diagnosis and treatment in traumatic tardive intracranial hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性遲發性顱內血腫的診治要點。

sentences.english: The hematomas had crescent or long ribbon shape.
sentences.chinese: 血腫呈新月形及長條狀。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
